db:abstract.db:para: Creating a simple console application that communicates with a CoAP server.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT -= gui QT += network coap
TARGET = testapp
HEADERS += \ coaphandler.h
SOURCES += main.cpp \ coaphandler.cpp
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/coap/consolecoapclient INSTALLS += target
